p: Summer plant senescence averaged 59.2% (± 2.5 SE) (among years: 30.1–85.6%) ( Fig 4B), significantly varied among years and increased 119% over our study ( Table 2, Fig 4B). Renewed fall plant production after the period of summer senescence ( Fig 2) accounted on average for 3.5% of ANPP (± 0.6 SE) (among years: 0–12.6%), and significantly decreased by 67.8% over our study ( Fig 4C).
